陞進: (しょうしん) - promotion; advancement; rising in rank
院: (in) - institution , house of parliament (congresso, dieta, etc.); graduate school, postgraduate school; institution (often medical), institutional building, government office; sub-temple, minor temple building, temple, cloister
院主: (いんじゅ) - head of a temple
院内: (いんない) - inside the House (Diet); inside the hospital
院内会派: (いんないかいは) - in-house faction (political groups within the Diet)
院内感染: (いんないかんせん) - infection incurred while hospitalized (hospitalised); nosocomial infection
院内総務: (いんないそうむ) - floor leader; party whip
院号: (いんごう) - former emperor (or his empress, imperial princesses, etc.); posthumous Buddhist name containing the character "in"
院外: (いんがい) - outside congress/non-parliamentary; non-hospital (e.g. dispensary, pharmacy, treatment)/outside a hospital
院外団: (いんがいだん) - nonparliamentary party association
院宣: (いんせん) - imperial command (decree); decree of cloistered emperor
院政: (いんせい) - government by cloistered emperors
陣: (jin) - acampamento, formação de batalha; acampamento, posicionamento; grupo, gangue, partido, corpo; guerra, batalha, campanha
陣々: (じんじん) - each encampment; strong (wind)/fierce; intermittent
陣を張る: (じんをはる) - to pitch camp; to set up camp
陣を敷く: (じんをしく) - to encamp; to take up a position
陣を立てなおす: (じんをたてなおす) - to redeploy troops
陣を立て直す: (じんをたてなおす) - to redeploy troops
陣中: (じんちゅう) - in camp; at the front
陣中見舞: (じんちゅうみまい) - (yoji) visiting soldiers at the front to provide comfort; visit to (gift for) persons hard at work as a sign of support
陣中見舞い: (じんちゅうみまい) - (yoji) visiting soldiers at the front to provide comfort; visit to (gift for) persons hard at work as a sign of support
陣取り: (じんとり) - children's game in which the aim is to occupy the other's home base; taking a place/securing a position
陣取る: (じんどる) - to encamp; to take up positions
陣営: (jin'ei) - camp (group of same ideological beliefs), faction (of political party); military camp, encampment, cantonment
陣容: (じんよう) - battle formation/battle array; lineup (of a team, etc.)/cast/staff/team structure
陣形: (じんけい) - battle formation; military formation
陣法: (じんぽう) - disposition of troops; battle formation
陣痛促進剤: (じんつうそくしんざい) - labor-inducing drugs
陣痛室: (じんつうしつ) - labor room; labour room
陣皮: (ちんぴ) - dried citrus peel (esp. of a satsuma mandarin) used as seasoning and in traditional Chinese medicine; chenpi
陣笠: (じんがさ) - ancient soldier's hat; common soldier; rank and file (of a political party)
陣笠議員: (じんがさぎいん) - backbench member (Parliament, Congress, Diet); backbencher; minor politician
陣笠連: (じんがされん) - common soldier; rank and file (of a political party)
陣鉦: (じんがね) - bell or gong used to signal soldiers
陣鐘: (じんがね) - bell or gong used to signal soldiers
陣門: (じんもん) - surrender to the enemy
陣陣: (じんじん) - each encampment; strong (wind)/fierce; intermittent
陣頭: (じんとう) - head of an army
陣頭指揮: (じんとうしき) - (yoji) taking command of a corps in a battle; command exercised by the leader of a group
除々: (じょじょ) - gradually/steadily/quietly/slowly/little by little; soon
除く: (のぞく) - to remove/to eliminate/to eradicate; to exclude/to except
除ける: (よける) - (よける only) to avoid (physical contact with); (さける only) to avoid (situation); to ward off/to avert
除け者: (のけもの) - outcast; odd man out; pariah
除け者にする: (のけものにする) - to shun somebody; to send a person to Coventry; to ignore someone
除する: (じょする) - to divide (by); to remove/to exclude
除光液: (じょこうえき) - nail polish remover
除塵: (じょじん) - dust removal; dust supression
除塵機: (じょじんき) - dust collector; dust extractor
除夜の鐘: (joyanokane) - sino do templo tocou 108 vezes na véspera de Ano Novo
除斥期間: (じょせききかん) - (time limit imposed by the) statute of limitations
除服: (じょふく) - coming out of mourning
除染: (じょせん) - decontamination (e.g. from chemical or radioactive contamination)
除水: (じょすい) - removing water; draining; bailing
除災: (じょさい) - warding off calamities; getting rid of bad luck
除目: (じょもく) - ceremony for appointing officials other than ministers (from the Heian period)
除算演算子: (じょざんえんざんし) - division operator
除籍: (じょせき) - removing a name; expelling (e.g. from school)/decommissioning
